item.title: valpal add a quote by Herman Wouk
item.description: "When in danger or in doubt, run in circles, scream and shout." -- Herman Wouk

item.title: valpal add a quote by Louise Erdrich
item.description: "Life will break you. Nobody can protect you from that, and living alone won't either, for solitude will also break you with its yearning. You have to love. You have to feel. It is the reason you are here on earth. You are here to risk your heart. You are here to be swallowed up. And when it happens that you are broken, or betrayed, or left, or hurt, or death brushes near, let yourself sit by an apple tree and listen to the apples falling all around you in heaps, wasting their sweetness. Tell yourself you tasted as many as you could." -- Louise Erdrich

item.title: valpal add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: valpal add a quote by Brendan Halpin
item.description: "Yeah, well. You're my best friend, you know, and I love you." -- Brendan Halpin

item.title: valpal add a quote by Lawrence Durrell
item.description: "Life is like a cucumber. One minute it's in your hand, the next it's up you ass." -- Lawrence Durrell

item.title: valpal add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "What fresh hell is this?" -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: valpal add a quote by Mary Ann Shaffer
item.description: "I never met a man half so true as a dog. Treat a dog right, and he'll treat you right. He'll keep you company, be your friend, and never ask you no questions. Cats is different, but I never held that against 'em." -- Mary Ann Shaffer

item.title: valpal add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I like men who have a future and women who have a past." -- Oscar Wilde
